channel.title: Projects on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Release: New Tab Redirect 3.0
item.description: On Wednesday, I began the rollout of New Tab Redirect 3.0 with some bug fixes and a huge new feature: a built in ‘Apps’ page.

item.title: jquery.empuzzle @github
item.description: For the past few days, I’ve been writing this plugin called jquery.empuzzle. It was inspired by ‘Jigsy’ at cityposh.com. It is a basic N-puzzle

item.title: Quake tracker is now officially open-source
Select Actions Update (Google Chrome Extension)
item.description: Last night, I published a major update to the Select Actions Google Chrome Extension. This update removes some “scary” permissions which claimed the extension had access to all websites.

item.title: Google Chrome Extension: New Tab Redirect! STEP BY STEP
item.description: If you’ve reached this this page in an attempt to find instructions for uninstalling the extension here they are: Navigate to chrome://extensions Click ‘Uninstall’ below ‘New Tab Redirect!

item.title: Select Actions, Chrome Extension
item.description: Another extension for Google Chrome, Select Actions adds popup menu functionality to selected text. To use, highlight some text and the menu will display for 3 seconds.

item.title: New Tab Redirect!
item.description: [][1]Google Chrome Extension - New Tab Redirect! I wanted to write an extension for Google’s Chrome browser. I did some research to find out what a lot of people *wished* would exist.

item.title: Google Chrome Extension: New Tab Redirect!
item.description: Thanks to the blizzard this weekend, I’ve been alone and stuck inside long enough to write an extension for Google Chrome.
